actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to facilitate the study of the New River for designation as component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Provides, under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act, for a suspension in the granting of permits and licenses to build, or the actual building, of any dam or reservoir, until the study of a segment of the New River in North Carolina and Virginia for designation as a component of the national wild and scenic rivers system has been completed by the Secretary of the Interior.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to facilitate the study of the New River for designation as component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
